Portraiture Photography

From capturing company culture to the intimate moments between couples on their wedding day, I love taking photos of people. Opting to use the beautiful, natural light over studio lighting, I often photograph people in the outside surroundings. Get in touch if you'd like to chat about having me take your portrait.
